<h3 id="X39897">X(39897) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: MANDART-INCIRCLE TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a+b-c)*(a-b+c)*(2*a^4-(b+c)^2*a^2+(b^2+c^2)*(b+c)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39897) = 2*X(1469)-3*X(5434)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39897) lies on these lines: {1,3564}, {3,39901}, {4,39891}, {6,12}, {11,613}, {33,39871}, {55,6776}, {56,69}, {57,32861}, {65,5847}, {141,1428}, {182,5432}, {193,388}, {206,9652}, {226,3791}, {495,1353}, {497,5921}, {498,5050}, {511,7354}, {518,10944}, {524,1469}, {542,3024}, {599,5298}, {611,15888}, {612,11245}, {895,12903}, {999,11898}, {1284,15991}, {1317,3242}, {1350,15326}, {1351,1478}, {1386,15950}, {1397,26942}, {1429,33082}, {1479,18440}, {1503,3056}, {1697,39878}, {1837,39885}, {1992,11237}, {2098,39898}, {2330,8550}, {2646,39870}, {2854,32243}, {3085,14912}, {3295,39899}, {3583,39884}, {3585,21850}, {3600,20080}, {3614,14561}, {3620,7288}, {3629,19369}, {3751,5252}, {3763,7294}, {4294,39874}, {4299,33878}, {4995,11179}, {5034,31460}, {5039,10797}, {5093,9654}, {5204,10519}, {5217,25406}, {5443,38040}, {5480,8540}, {5820,10957}, {5845,24816}, {5965,18984}, {7173,10516}, {7235,17362}, {7741,18358}, {7951,18583}, {8593,12350}, {10106,34379}, {10752,12373}, {10753,12184}, {10754,13182}, {10755,13273}, {10759,12763}, {10766,13296}, {10799,39872}, {10831,19459}, {10833,39879}, {10877,39882}, {10895,14853}, {10927,39887}, {10928,39888}, {10947,39889}, {10949,12586}, {10953,39890}, {10965,39902}, {10966,39883}, {11180,11238}, {11375,16475}, {11392,12167}, {11579,32307}, {11873,39880}, {11874,39881}, {11909,39886}, {11947,39895}, {11948,39896}, {12589,15069}, {12837,32451}, {13901,19145}, {13958,19146}, {14982,32290}, {14984,18968}, {15983,28386}, {15988,25466}, {16496,37738}, {16603,33682}, {18954,37491}, {18970,34382}, {18990,34380}, {19037,39875}, {19038,39876}, {24836,32029}, {24953,26543}, {26625,30778}, {26629,39141}, {26888,34774}, {35808,39893}, {35809,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39897) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6284, 3056), (39873, 1)<br>
X(39897) = X(69)-of-2nd-anti-circumperp-tangential-triangle<br>
X(39897) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (6, 12588, 12), (141, 1428, 5433), (497, 5921, 39892), (613, 1352, 11), (3295, 39899, 39900), (10923, 19027, 12), (10924, 19028, 12)<br>
</p>
